tns:patch.keyword: Add global setting with phantom JS url
tns:patch.author: apicca
tns:patch.description: Add global setting to be able to customize from where phantom JS will be downloaded

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings(id, settingsname, settingsvalue, possiblevalues, description, section, value_translatable) VALUES (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'),'PhantomJS URL', 'https://storage.googleapis.com/google-code-archive-downloads/v2/code.google.com/phantomjs/', null, 'URL to get PhantomJS Library that will be used by GIS Download Image feature', 'general', null);
